<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"

>
[Hidden Thorn](/Feats.aspx?ID=3948) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ghoran" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=352" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 37</row>

</column>

---

Some flowers can hide their thorns, and yours happen to be hidden along your arms. You gain a thorns unarmed attack that deals 1d6 piercing damage. Your thorns are in the [knife](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=9) weapon group and have the [finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179) and [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) traits.

<title level="2">Hidden Thorn leads to...</title>
[Murderous Thorns](/Feats.aspx?ID=3950)
